resources.string: Smart Vehicle Refrigerator is a special APP developed by Smart Vehicle Refrigerator Factory. We are determined to create a full-scale solution for you. Success comes step by step. Dear you, whether you use in dormitories, apartments, self-driving trips, trucks, we are trying to do more for you. \n We are determined to make the high-end products in the market universal. While constantly improving the quality, we believe that generous prices are the bottom line of our constant pursuit of goals. We will always stand together with you to help happiness! \n Happiness is a moment and a long time. Smart Car Refrigerator It" right there!
Make sure your refrigerator is on and your cell phone is near the refrigerator!
Make sure your refrigerator is on!
System Bluetooth is off, please turn on System Bluetooth
The set temperature range is -25℃ to 20℃
